message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value.  This product offers unique advantages and I'm confident it can generate substantial returns for you. Would you consider meeting in the middle at $1,700,000?
I understand the product's value, but $1,700,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,300,000. Can we discuss further?
